oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Mechanical hands exhibit
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man sits in a chair and operates a machine to pull a match from a matchbox while men, women and children observe behind him.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Audiences; Children; Industrial technician; Interiors; Scientific equipment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: MED 176-1; 1949; Exhibit in Warehouse, "Mechanical Hands"; Applications of Atomic Energy
